snippet: Residents of Weed, Calif., are battling a timber company for the rights to water that has been piped to houses in the area for more than a century....
abstract: Timber company Roseburg Forest Products, which has for 50 years provided water to town of Weed, Calif, tells residents they must find new water source; company owns land where spring is and has been selling water to Crystal Geyser Alpine Spring, which bottles it for export and wants to increase its supply; dispute reflects state's ongoing competition for water.
lead_paragraph: Residents of Weed, Calif., are battling a timber company for the rights to water that has been piped to houses in the area for more than a century.

headline.main: Timber Company Tells California Town, Go Find Your Own Water
headline.print_headline: Timber Company Tells Town in California,  Find Your Own Water
